summary:
process engineer with Nine years of process engineering multidisciplinary experience with proven ability to deliver optimum engineering solutions and executions to oil and gas projects in all project stages (conceptual, feed, basic & detail engineering) as a process engineer whether working independently or operating as part of a cross functional team.
Experienced in sizing of pipelines/plants piping, vessels, control valves, pump hydraulics and relief valves as well as complete system hydraulics for plants and pressure profiles. Provide process Data for line Lists & Tie-In Lists, control valves and all plant instrumentation.
Responsible for preparing Process Basis of Design to guide the rest of the engineering and design team to start the required engineering activities required for project execution, prepare simulation models using Aspen Hysys, developing PFD’s & P&ID’s, conduct process feasibility studies & Debottleneck Studies of various process plants, producing Cause & Effect Diagrams and Safety Analysis & Function Evaluation Chart.
Responsible for co-ordination of Process and coordination with other discipline specialists where areas interface or overlap.
Prepare pre-commissioning procedures and participate in pre-commissioning, commissioning & start-up activities.
Preparation & participation in HAZOP meetings and implementing & closing out of HAZOP actions as process specialist and HAZOP scribe.
Preparation of process equipment data sheets and familiar with chemical engineering handbooks and standards like API, Shell DEP’s, BP ETP’s & GPSA and reviewing and checking vendor documents.Coordinate with projects and planning on project time schedules, establish target completion dates, ensure target dates are achieved and participate in project feasibility studies & evaluation as well as determination of process scope and man-hours activities for projects.

Specialties: Process Engineer in Oil & Gas Sector
